name: Upward! (2D Platformer)
description:
This is my project for Game Design and Development 2: 2D Platformer

I was not able to build for WebGL but have provided versions for Windows, MacOs, and Linux.

I made the following modifications:

Music:

-created new main menu music in Garageband

-created music for the main game levels in Garageband

UI:

-changed level win screen to say "Level Complete"

-added buttons for all three levels to the level selection screen and gave each level a unique, descriptive name

-gave the game a new name and updated the name on the main screen

-added instructions

-added credits

Design:

-designed three complete, unique levels with escalating levels of difficulty
